about_the_game:
** Due to Unity's CEO's current pricing and decisions, we will have to port the game over to Epic's Unreal Engine 5. This has pushed the intended launch date into 2025. Thank you for your continued support, and we will post updates soon!**

Dreg Cannon is an action/adventure game set in the near future where Kyle works as a scavenger collecting items for his uncle. Equipped with a weapon forged from the greatest mind of all time, follow him through his conquest to seek revenge against an evil warlord and stop his lieutenants from destroying the city.

Build your weapons with a unique “Forge System,” upgrade yourself and your arsenal, and take the fight to an unfeeling group of cyborg terrorists. Using your arm-mounted cannon, you will blast, shoot, explode, and… drench your foes in this action-packed, frenetic shooter.

The Tecno-mages and their twisted warlord will know the wrath of a simple scavenger from the Slums!

Features:
• Frenetic FPS combat with a unique weapon
• Explore a juxtaposed world of squalor and high-tech
• Collectibles
• Leaderboards
• Ability progression
• A variety of enemies, both mechanical and organic, as well as some in between

Compete with your friends with Steam leaderboards.
Plays great with the Steam Deck.

Dreg Cannon is available in English, Spanish and French coming soon.
